home.title: Home
home.description: Senseteq develops software applications faster and cheaper. People are most important, and we choose customers who feel the same.
home.keywords: development, the first version of the product, modular development, back-end, front-end, mobile applications, technology consulting, Prototype development, UI, UX, design, project management

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: Our experience with top-class technologies and our ability to quickly adopt new ones enables us to build applications of any size and complexity.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: We have created projects that are reliable, fast and easy to use.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: We know how important it is to have high speed and control over costs. It is beneficial to become a customer with us. We quickly give you a very advantageous fixed price on your project.
pricing.keywords: favorable prices, services, fully scalable, highest performance, simple branding and profile, first version

team.title: Team
team.description: We are a close-knit team that thrives on work. We celebrate each other's progress and help when needed.

footer.subtitle: Contact
footer.title: We invite all start-up companies to get in touch!

prime_section.title: We will make the MVP version in 19 working days.
prime_section.subtitle: Do you think this is impossible? Scroll down to see how we do it.

how_we_do_it_section.title: How do we do it?

project_support_section.title: We can develop and support no more than 24 projects per year.
project_support_section.subtitle: We will take your if:

technologies_section.title: Technologies and innovations.
technologies_section.subtitle: Our experience with modern technologies and our capability to quickly make use of new ones make us the ideal team to build applications of any size and complexity.

how_it_works_section.title: How does it work?
how_it_works_section.subtitle: How is the process? What happens when I am taken on as a customer?

ukranian_developers_section.title: Why Ukraine developers?
ukranian_developers_section.description: Ukraine developers rank as the most proficient and experienced practitioners in custom software, web and app development. On TopCoder and Hackerrank, Ukraine feature in a high ranking system that saw the countries’ top the list for most advanced software development skillset.

about_senseteq_section.title: About Senseteq.
about_senseteq_section.descriptionLine1: We are a Norwegian-Ukrainian company, which aims to revolutionize the approach to web development. Our mission is to make the world a better place through our contribution. We love people. We make a difference in the lives of our customers and our employees.
about_senseteq_section.descriptionLine2: We set the same standard for our customers. They are dedicated startups that wants to make a difference for people, in any part of their lives.
about_senseteq_section.descriptionLine3: We invite everyone to be part of it. Come join us and make Sense!

prime_section.title: Technologies and innovations.
prime_section.subtitle: Our experience with state of the art technologies and our capability to adapt to new standards fast make us the ideal team for building applications of any size and complexity.

secret_weapon_section.subtitle: Our secret weapon
secret_weapon_section.title: Qonsoll builder.
secret_weapon_section.descripion: Our developers perform like superstars. Yes they are brilliant, but the main reason why they can deliver fast and always have a meaningful workday is also this: they have access to our own Qonsoll builder. Qonsoll eliminates the need for doing time consuming repetitive work. It reduces time and increases quality.

prime_section.title: Prices pr. hour.
prime_section.subtitleLine1: One of our biggest advantages is development speed, ie how much our developers get done per. hour. We therefore want to provide a pre-agreed and very favorable price.
prime_section.subtitleLine2: We know how important it is to have high speed and control over costs. It is beneficial to become a customer with us. We quickly give you a very advantageous fixed price on your project. The prices below may give you an indication, but you get an individual assessment.

prime_section.title: Who are we?
prime_section.subtitle: We are a close-knit team that thrives on work. We celebrate each other's progress and help when needed. We have a flat structure in the company, built on trust and competence. All our developers are committed and quickly feel ownership of new projects.

rising_stars_section.title: Our rising stars.
rising_stars_section.subtitle: I have to admit, we look at them as stars already. They are dedicated, passionate and they love to develop products that matter. Look forward to listening to their ideas and being inspired by their input. And of course: They deliver great code that builds great products.

prime_section.title: How is the process?
prime_section.subtitle: What can you expect when you are selected as a customer with us?

selections.title: Selection
selections.description: After the first contact and having received a description of the project, we make an assessment to ensure that it is a good match for our development teams and that the project has a positive impact on people's lives.

offer.title: Offer and specification
offer.description: After agreeing on the different personas and scenarios for them, we specify an offer at a fixed price for a well-defined scope.

start-up.title: Start-up
start-up.description: Upon approval of the offer, a dedicated development team will be assigned. It is optional how much you as a customer want to be involved along the way.

development.title: Development
development.description: In this phase, you as a customer will see very fast progress, and it will be exciting to follow from day to day, if you wish.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: We recommend that the application is launched and tested on real customers as soon as possible. Although both bug fixes and even better functionality are planned. You get the best feedback from users. Always.

repetitive_work.title: Repetitive work has been automated
repetitive_work.description: We classified the entire range of tasks that we had to work with, identified the most resource-intensive and automated their implementation.

idea_parser.title: Idea parser
idea_parser.description: We use our own tool that converts the description of a project or new functionality into a data structure. This helps us find better solutions to your business problem.

architecture_tool.title: Project architecture tool
architecture_tool.description: This tool helps us to efficiently create the database structure, API and develop custom user flows.

code_generator.title: Code generator
code_generator.description: Thanks to our approach to classifying and structuring data, as well as the previously mentioned applications, we generate a big part of the applications automatically.

task_generator.title: Task generator
task_generator.description: We have minimized human intervention in the process of creating tasks for developers. Thus, we know the exact time of completion of most tasks with an accuracy of 10 minutes.

modularity.title: Modularity
modularity.description: We have created many modules that we can quickly integrate into the application and change to suit your needs without having to create this functionality from scratch.

startup.title: Your are a startup
startup.description: You are an entrepeneur in a startup, or you are head of a new project within an established company.

difference.title: You make a difference
difference.description: Your idea or project will make a positive impact on peoples lives, in any part of their wellbeing.

care.title: You care
care.description: Business is done between people, not companies. We are a high trust company and we work together with companies that also take care of their employees and trust them.

quickly_changes.title: Quickly make any changes to the project

security.title: Serious about security and sensitive data

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Digitalizing the healthcare and welfare sector. Our experience in this sector is substantial.

hotel.title: Hotels and tourism
hotel.description: We are digitizing the tourism industry.

education.title: Education
education.description: We are digitizing the education sector.

energy.title: Oil and energy
energy.description: We are digitizing the oil and energy sector. We have considerable experience.

transport.title: Car and transport
transport.description: We are digitizing the car industry. We have considerable experience.

production.title: Production
production.description: We are digitizing the production sector.

question.title: Can't find your industry?
question.description: We still want to hear from you.

outsourcing.title: TOP 3
outsourcing.subtitle: Top outsourcing country in Eastern Europe

menta.description: Menta Health is an international initiative to improve and streamline the treatment of anxiety and depression.

worktube.description: Worktube is an automated recruitment and staffing service.

b2g.description: Buy2gether is an app that makes it easy and safe to buy an apartment with others.

qonsoll.description: Qonsoll is a toolbox for developers, which automates, simplifies and increases the quality of development work.

fractal.description: Fractal Academy is a future-oriented academy that teaches young developers today's and tomorrow's development tools. Free.

small.name: Small
small.description: Creating a MVP version of an applikasjon that has limited size and complexity.

medium.name: Medium
medium.description: Creating a MVP version of an applikasjon that has medium size and complexity. May include mobile apps (iOS and Android).

big.name: Big
big.description: Creating a MVP version of an applikasjon that has large size and complexity. May include mobile apps (iOS and Android).

comprehensive.name: Comprehensive
comprehensive.description: Creating a MVP version of an applikasjon that has comprehensive size and complexity. May include mobile apps (iOS and Android).
